specific_question: What was the median employee tenure in Q3 2025?
answer: Median employee tenure was 2.5 years with 75% of employees having less than 3 years of service.
justification: Employee tenure metrics do not address the core DR Question focus area of IT service desk workload and response times
dr_question: How can we leverage ISTM and AI-driven analytics to minimize IT service desk workload and improve response times in MediConn Solutions?
